title: Reaper
summaries: The Reaper is a Hardmode enemy that spawns during a Solar Eclipse. On the [img:Desktop version] Desktop version, [img:Console version] Console version, and [img:Mobile version] Mobile version, it will only spawn after all mechanical bosses have been defeated.

Reapers behave in a similar manner to <linked>Wraiths</linked>, but they have higher stats. They move significantly faster than Wraiths, and with the higher spawn rate of the Solar Eclipse, they often attack from multiple directions at once.

They are fairly vulnerable to <linked>knockback</linked>. Like many creatures that pass through <linked>blocks</linked>, they do not take damage from <linked>lava</linked>. Furthermore, weapons whose animations do not stop upon hitting blocks, like most <linked>melee weapons</linked>, will damage them despite not normally being able to attack through blocks.
